name: The Skeleton (Original Draft)
description:
A short, poetic game about complicity.

The skeleton skulks at the top of the mountain. Thrawn shards of black metal that look over the flats. You are a messenger. In your pack is a sealed envelope that you will deliver to the top of the mountain, to the crew working at the base of the skeleton

This was the first version of the game. It's changed a lot since then, but I've kept it up as it's nice to see where things have come from.
